{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Huawei |model = HG256s |submodelappend = |submodel = B |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = wireless router, analog phone gateway |sernum = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3052F; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 384 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640ETTI-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ESMT;M12L128168A-6T; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8316; |dsl_ports = 1 |voip_ports = 2 |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = CC:96:A0,1C:1D:67 |oui = CC:96:A0,1C:1D:67 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, VoIP |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = VoIP |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = HG256s-XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^HG256s-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none (internal) |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is used by {{Used by service|StarHub}}, [[w:StarHub|a Singaporean ISP]]. ===Difference from HG256=== This "s" model differs functionally from the standard HG256 as follows: * has 2 VoIP ports (with corresponding status LEDs in front) compared to 1 for HG256 * has 4 x gigabit LAN ports, compared to 4 x 10/100 LAN ports for HG256 ===Info=== * S/N: 21530314957S190067XX (last 2 chars obfuscated) * BASE MAC: CC96A0DE11XX (last 2 chars obfuscated) * MTA MAC: CC96A0DE11XX (last 2 chars obfuscated) * SSID: HG256s-DE11XX (last 3 bytes of mac address) ===Boilerplate at bottom=== * MODEL: HG256s * NAME: Home Gateway * POWER RATING: DC 12V; 1.5A 
CE 0678
bgn Wifi CERTIFIED
7S
dual stream n
HUAWEI TECHNOLOGIES CO., LTD.   MADE IN CHINA
==Links of Interest== * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/huawei/hg255d Huawei HG256 on OpenWRT Wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Device page in firmware=== * Product type HG256s * Device ID 6416F0-21530314957S190067XX (last 2 chars obfuscated) * Hardware version VER.B * Software version V100R001C02B027 * MAC address CC:96:A0:DE:11:XX (last 2 chars obfuscated) ===Hidden URL=== to set WAN type to dhcp (courtesy of albertlee from hwz forums) http://192.168.0.1/html/wizard/wizard.asp ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== * Connector: J602 * Pinouts: ** 1 - Vcc ** 2 - n/c ** 3 - rx ** 4 - GND ** 5 - tx * Speed: 57600 {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:20141124_153616.jpg|PCBA top view File:20141124_160722.jpg|PCBA bottom view File:20141124_160657.jpg|Closeup of SoC and flash
